resources.string: alert your friends you are OK
Your custom hotline has been set.
You can enter your custom number at any time by calling back this tutorial from the app. Just tap on the icon at the bottom right of the screen.

Welcome to Circle of 6. This app links you to friends & safety resources, allowing you to support each other in a specific moment & throughout the year. Circle of 6 is fast, easy to use, and confidential. It\'s the mobile way to reach your circle, and look out for your friends with a simple text message. Circle of 6 U connects you quickly and easily to resources for support, safety, and prevention.

With Circle of 6, you can connect with your friends to stay close, stay safe and prevent violence before it happens. The Circle of 6 app makes it quick and easy to reach the 6 friends you choose. Need help getting home? Need an interruption? Two touches lets your circle know where you are and how they can help. Icons represent actions; so that no one can tell what you\’re up to. Designed for safety, its fast, easy-to-use and private. It\’s the mobile way to look out for your friends, on campus or when you\’re out for the night.
You\'ve been added to my Circle of 6, see www.circleof6app.com for info.
Call local, campus-specific hotlines, safety numbers, and your customized number

Tap on the icons to learn
what they do

add up to 6 contacts
(app works with 3)

send a text that says,
“come and get me” to your circle with your GPS location

send a text that says,
“call and pretend you need me” to your circle if you need an interruption

send a text that says,
“I need to talk” to your circle

send a text that says,
“I\'m ok, I got help” to your circle
Call local, campus-specific hotlines, safety numbers, and your customized number
OK, swipe right to learn about the features and get started!
It was not possible to send your message to

Tap on the phone icon, this will take you to a choice of 2 pre-programmed hotlines and one you can customize: Rape or Sexual Assault: RAINN 1-800-656-4673 (HOPE) Relationship Abuse: Love is Respect 1-866-331-9474 For the third option, take a moment to find out the number for a women\'s or anti-violence support center, or emergency service of your choice. Plug it in here. This is an optional function. If you choose to leave it blank, you will still have the 2 national hotlines.

Tap on the phone icon. This will take you to a choice of 2 hotlines (only one is 24/7) and a customizable emergency number. For the New Delhi 24/7 Police Hotline for Women: 181. For Women\'s Rights and Advocacy: JAGORI + 91 11 2669 2700. Additionally, you can plug in a number of your choice: We suggest Legal Help: LAWYER\'S COLLECTIVE +91-11-46805555. This is an optional function. If you choose to leave it blank, you will still have New Delhi 24/7 hotline and Jagori numbers.
Your friend does not have a phone number
I\'m using @Circleof6app, check it out! Stay connected and stay safe.
Take me back to the app
It is not a valid phone number
Thanks for using Circle of 6! Tap here to share the love :)
Check you internet connection and retry.
